message: Let's start with a simple offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects the urgency for a quick agreement due to inflation.
I believe a more even split is fair, considering we both want to minimize the impact of inflation.
Bob, time is money!  Let's settle this now. I'm offering a bit more than last time, but I need you to be realistic about the declining value.
I think we're getting closer, but I still believe a more even split is necessary to compensate for the loss due to inflation.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. The longer we wait, the less your share will be worth. It's time to be pragmatic.
I'm willing to meet in the middle of our last offers.
